testcase.name: Validate Amazon order flow - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User launch Amazon webpage with "https://www.amazon.co.in/"...........passed When User see sign up or sign in button.....................................passed Then User click on sign in..................................................passed And User see login page.....................................................passed Then User enter "svkshrm@gmail.com".........................................passed And User clicks on continue.................................................passed When User click on continue user navigated to password page.................passed Then User enter password "Saswati1999@".....................................passed And user click on sign in button............................................passed Then User navigate to homepage..............................................passed And User search for iphone13................................................passed Then User clicks on first link..............................................passed And User validate...........................................................passed
